FC_DESCRIPTION: Changes the font color of a card by applying a "Glow" to it
NOT_CARD_OWNER: Oh no! it's sad but you can't change font color of cards you DONT OWN!!!
CANNOT_FIND_CARD: Can't find your last card or try providing a card code
3D_ERROR: You can't change font color for 3D cards
CANNOT_FIND_GLOW: {{author}} couldn't find that glow in your palette. Is the code correct?
